38881050.review:
A quaint rpg with a good battle system and a plausable, if predictable, story. The characters had life and depth to them and I could often tell who was speaking without the use of the dialogue box and faceset, maintaining their personality throughout the game.

The NPCS were silly and the game often made fun of itself; which I found enjoyable as the story was definately not intending to be serious. I was a little disappointed it didn't break the mold of the standard grind for gear or levels, but it was minimal enough that I was able to use the escape function for a large portion of combat, and maintaining the tropes of past games was an obvious part of its charm. Overall I give this game a thumbsup and would recommend the purchase if you are looking to fill the gap of a few hours of time or for inspiration to your own gaming titles or literature.

36514761.review:
So I was looking for a mobile game to play and very few them are interesting to me. One of the only ones that caught my interest was Doom and Destiny which I got for free. During my playthrough I found it also was on Steam. My response: SHUT UP AND TAKE MY MONEY!

Story:
Four guys just arrived to their friends house to play some D&D when a kingdom summons  them to defeat a dark evil before some plans he may or may not be plotting. Now they go on an adventure to find a way home  in a world filled with jokes, cameos, references and killer chickens.
While the characters aren't anything special, I found the story and world very interesting. Like Undertale, it embraces all the cliches and tropes of RPG's with jokes from various sources like Final Fantasy and Legend of Zelda. It's also pretty funny with a few jokes that made me laugh out loud and while I didn't get every reference, I still enjoy  comedy and viewing this game's story as a comedy is the best way to enjoy it.

Gameplay:
The battle system is simple but hard and fair where you control a mage, a knight, a ninja and a pirate with healing powers. It's turn based and depending on your moves will determine who'll go next and the timeline can help you decide on you're next target or what to use on them to slow them down. As for abilities, first you need to buy them and then use PP to equip them, which you get by filling out your attributes as you gain levels. Nothing to hard but the enemies, even early on, can do some decent damage. 
This game also encourages you to grind and look for secrets because you'll need the money to buy weapons and powers and you can do sidequests by killing enemies to get some good gear or items. This leads to biggest praise is how big this world is. Sure, you can head straight to the dungeon where you have to go while buying some gear, OR you could buy a candle and go to the church, go to the towns  to decide what to buy, go to the mines, grind some enemies or look for the secrets in the starting town, all within the first few hours of the game. And after the final boss, is the game over? Nope. In fact the game has only opened up even more once you buy some transportation so you can upgrade your powers, get the best gear and fight the superbosses, which I beat except for the super secret one. My opinion, the three dragons in the dragon nest were the hardest for me.

Presentation:
From what I found out about this game and the fact this is RPG Maker, most of the graphics(except for the main party and a few portraits) are from the maker itself and from I read, the music is also not original. Those it make it bad. Oh god no. The assets were put to good use, giving nice details to every location and the music fits the areas your in. And I like how in battle, the sprites are basically the overworld sprites. So much detail.

Verdict:
If you want a good game for your phone, this would be a fun RPG to play on the go. And if you want to get on Steam. Sure, support the creator.
8/10

35243823.review:
[b]Doom & Destiny[/b] ist ein klassisches RPG, das RPG Klischees auf die Schippe nimmt.

Wer keine Lust auf den Wall of Text hat, scrollt runter zur Zusammenfassung :)

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
Man steuert seine Gruppe vpn vier helden mit den Pfeiltasten durch Ortschaften, Dungeon und die Weltkarte. Kämpfe werden durch Randomencounter ausgelöst 
(Gegner sind auf der Karte unsichtbar, man wird beim Herumlaufen in Kämpfe verwickelt)
und laufen Rundenweise ab. Oben rechts im Kampfbildschirm wird die Zugreihenfolge angezeigt, die sich duch unterschiedliche Aktionen wie das Verwenden von Techniken, benutzen von items und normalen Angriffen beeinflussen lässt. Erwähnenswert ist hier, dass einige Techniken den Gegner in der Zugreihenfolge nach hinten verdrängen können und wieder andere den Anwender später erneut zum Zug kommen lassen. Ebenfalls integriert ist ein "Aggrosystem", das Gegner den Helden angreifen lässt, de rbesonders viel Schaden verursacht oder Heilung spendet. Eben so gibt es Angriffe, die mehr Aggro aufbauen und wieder welche, die keine aufbauen.

Bei einem Level-Up erhält ein Charakter 3 Statuspunkte, die er frei auf die vier Grundfertigkeiten verteilen kann, welche jede für sich zwei Statuswerte beinflussen. Wenn man genug in eine Grundfertigkeit investiert hat, bekommt der Charakter einen Skillpunkt, der Platz für anlegbare Fertigkeiten liefert. Charaktere lernen diese nicht wie üblich beim Aufleveln, sondern sie müssen bei Ausbildern gekauft werden und nehmen je nach Stärke einen oder zwei Skillpunkte in Beschlag. Fertikgeiten können nach Erwerb beliebig an und abgelegt werden.

[h1]Humor[/h1]
Der Humor zielt darauf ab, RPG Klischees auf die Schippe zu nehmen. Einige Filme und bekannte Spieleklassiker wie Super Mario und Zelda bekommen auch ihr Fett weg. Leider ist der Humor an so einigen Stellen eher Kindergartenniveau und erinnert stark an die Trashgames zu Anfangszeiten der deutschen Makerszene. Global betrachtet währe Das Spiel ohne Humor wohl besser geworden. Das ist zumindest meine Meinung.

[h1]Soundtrack/Grafik[/h1]
Der Soundtrack entstammt großteils(?) dem der anderen Maker, was jetzt nicht schlecht sein muss. Wer aber öfter Makerspiele spielt, wird vieles wieder erkennen. 
Die Grafik ist an der von den meisten RPG Maker VX Spielen angelehnt. Einige umgefärbte Grafiken sind dabei.
 Ansonsten befinden sich noch einige grafiken aus anderen makern darunter sowie welche, die wohl selbst gemacht sind wie die gesichtsgrafiken der Protagonisten.

[h1]Zusammenfassung[/h1]
[b]Pro[/b]
[list]
    [*]taktisch recht tiefgängiges Kampfsystem
    [*]optionaler Content und viele Geheimnisse zu entdecken
    [*]Viel Content nach Ende der Handlung
    [*]drei wählbare Schwierigkeitsgrade zu Beginn des Spiels
[/list]
[b]Contra[/b]
[list]
    [*]teils kindischer Humor
    [*]Weltkarte großteils eher leer
    [*]Für das, was geboten wird, doch etwas teuer
    [*]teils grindlastig
    [*]einige Rechtschreibfehler
[/list]

[b]Fazit[/b]
Bei Doom & Destiniy handelt es sich wohl um eines der Gameplaytechnisch besseren Makerspiele auf Steam. Wer seichte Unterhaltung mag, kann das Spiel direkt im Bundle oder noch besser im Rahmen eines Sales kaufen. Zum vollen Preis würde ich es nicht uneingeschränkt empfehlen. Wirklich fordernd wird das Spiel erst nach der Haupthandlung.
Mich hat das Spiel (Gameplaytechnisch) soweit ganz gut unterhalten, deswegen von mir eine Kaufempfehlung.

34924022.review:
What can I say about Doom & Destiny?! 
I think everything has already been told about this masterpiece!
We have a classic JRPG which takes a lot from Final Fantasy VI and similar games for what concerns graphics and gameplay (turn-based system, no ATB but fixed turns depending on stats etc.), but with an hilarious plot and literally fun on every single different screen you'll walk into.
The soundtrack is definitely nice too!
Lots of humour and lots of references to any kind of game or franchise (and pop culture!) you can imagine! It's really a lot of fun to find out every single reference!
As someone said, this little pearl can often be neglected or ignored, being it an indie JRPG and we all of course have played hundreds of JRPGs from the 8/16-bit era until nowadays, but this game has way more depth than one may expect. It's really great on any field: nothing is left to chance, everything is studied and has its own right place in the game's own world.
It's something that has been worked on for much time, and it's so enjoyable even for someone like me who has started playing JRPGs with imported cartridges for the SNES back in the '90s..
Get this game, at any cost!! :P

剛進入Steam的世界，共買了17款遊戲，就屬這一款讓我覺得ＣＰ值最高（都挑有特惠的買），中文優化做得很好，在字體大小和翻譯都看得出製作團隊的用心。

在選購遊戲上，
1.本身英文程度偏差，大多選購繁體中文或簡體中文的遊戲。
2.本身用macbook ，1.1GHz Intel Core M（duo)，筆電處理器屬於低階。
3.本身會特別關注 '極度好評' 與 '壓倒性好評' 的商品

原本擔心筆電處最低階設備會不會在遊戲進行有問題？但一切擔心都是多餘的。在購買前看了以往的中文評論，說簡體中文有問題，又有評論說已修復了。確實，進行遊戲後，遊戲順暢，中字顯示正常，由於遊戲屬於視窗化遊戲（非全螢幕），可以一邊聊天一邊輕鬆體驗遊戲，雖然才剛開始玩這遊戲，但已經深深被這遊戲的設計所吸引，可以在悠閒的片刻，進行一款經典的RPG遊戲，屬人生一大快事。最後，也推薦喜歡RPG的各位可以買下這款遊戲。

Giocai a questo fantastico gioco su Android (free), all'incirca un anno e mezzo fa, o giu' di li. Venendo da un passato trascorso fra GDR con battaglie a turni come Final Fantasy (mi ricorda troppo il terzo capitolo) e sessioni di D&D con i miei amici/cugini, l'ho amato davvero tanto. Su Android ci ho giocato e rigiocato per circa un centinaio di ore, e comprando questo titolo in saldo sono sinceramente gasato. Davvero divertente per quanto riguarda l'humor e la costruzione dei personaggi, e fresco e rilassante per quanto riguarda il GamePlay. Uniche piccole pecche, a mio parere, son la mancanza di un sistema per giocare in coop con gli amici (sia online che in locale) che lo distinguerebbe NETTAMENTE dagli altri GDR del genere; ed infine bisognerebbe poter velocizzare poco poco di piu' ogni dialogo (per chi lo vuole rigiocare senza fargli subire tutti i dialoghi).
Comunque il gioco è senz'altro sopra la media, anzi merita moltissimo. Fiero e felice del mio acquisto! Non vedo l'ora di comprare il secondo gioco della serie!

32883926.review:
Any game reliant on its humour to carry it needs a good script to deliver that humour, and this doesn't have one. The script is constantly awkward to read and has regular errors (such as in the store screenshot of "How DARE you talking like that about my mother!") that lead me to believe that this is an ESL translation. The parts of the script that aren't awkward on a technical level are typically just outdated pop culture references, that were already long outdated by the 2011 release date (Chuck Norris? Really?).
The gameplay itself is nothing remarkable, and the menu design in particular is pretty horrible, with no proper equip menu and instead items are just equipped from the inventory, which becomes unwieldy quite quickly.

You want to know the real reason this game is so highly rated? It's because every town has an NPC in it that begs you to give the game a positive review and opens the store page for you. I'm sure most people submitted these short and hollow positive reviews in the hope of getting a reward out of it.

Jogo muito bom. 


Pontos positivos:


1) Gráficos simples mas bem feitos. 

2) Boa trilha sonora. 

3) Conversação bem cômica e divertida. 

4) Bom sistema de lutas.  

5) Boa coleção de  equipamentos, itens e magias.

Contras:

3) Paguei R$ 10 por ele na promoção, achei um pouco caro pela simplicidade do jogo e pelo fato dele ser gratuito no celular, mas ainda assim acho que vale a pena o preço. 


Nota 8/10.

I only played this game for a little over an hour, but my experiences:
- Game isn't great or terrible... it's mostly "meh".
- Graphics are somewhat pretty.
- I wasn't able to find any AOE attacks in the time I played. It would have been nice for when I just wanted to blow through a fight faster.
- Some of the mechanics were unclear. ("Tactics" positioning, comparing item stats.)
- Lots of skills and items, maybe too many. I found myself spending money on items/skills, then finding better options 20 minutes later in the next town over.
- As many reviewers commented: having NPC's that ask you to review the game and insult you if you don't is irritating. (But at least they are clearly marked with heart symbols.)
- "Rations" system that automatically restores HP & MP after combat is nice.
- Fast combat option is nice, (speeds things up slightly), but speeding up the animations as well would have been even better.
- Too many NPC's for my taste, but this is a matter of personal preference I'm sure.

Как сказал один стражник из города " Не обязательно разговаривать со всеми, но иногда они рассказывают что то полезное. Правда чаще они говорят какой то бред."

В общем как японская рпг 10 \ 10 . Видно что авторы с любовью делали эту игру, куча деталей и пасхалок .

26428097.review:
I'm a bit surprised I liked this game as much as I did. I was a bit put off by the developer constantly adding "please review this game" NPCs in EVERY SINGLE TOWN. It's like I'll review it when I damn well feel like it. You really don't need to badger the player to review your game while playing your game, especially if you actually paid for the game. It really left a bad taste in my mouth and its wholly unnecessary.

Getting past that this game is fun. The developer definitely made use of all the RPG Maker sprites and the writing was decent. I like it when a gmae doesn't take itself too seriously. I also enjoyed a few of those "did you know?" random facts littered around the first town. Characters are pretty shallow and honestly I just remember them as red, blue, green and yellow. It was chock full of crass humor, game and anime references.

Surprisingly the story was good. Even with the all the different little quests along the way it never deviated from the focus of the group finding their missing friend and returning home. I was actually surprised about all the references made from a Mario-esque inspired landscape to a quest straight out of Dragonball Z. It’s quite a creative and fun use of RPG Maker that I haven’t seen in any of the multitude of games. 

Finishing the main story isn’t too difficult on normal setting. There are quite a lot of adventures to be had after completing the game. That’s when the difficulty ramps up and the game becomes a challenge. I’m still trying to complete the last couple of quests and there’s many places you don’t get to explore until after you finish the main story. There isn’t much replay value but with the amount of side quests included I think this game can draw out a solid 50 hours of gameplay if you’re the completionist type. 

If you’re into RPGs I’d highly recommend it. There’s plenty of story, nostalgia and humor to go around.

Ragazzi era da tanto che non sentivo in me la voglia di portare a termine un gioco al 100%: semplice e relativamente longevo da permettere di farlo. 
Ammetto che non avrei mai comprato questo gioco se non avessi beccato lo sconto al 50% ma ammetto anche che avrei fatto una gran cavolata. Ho passato la metà del tempo a ridere come un cretino e l'altra metà  affascinato da cosa sia possibile fare con RPG Maker (chi l'ha provato forse potrà capire). Vedendomi così divertito un mio amico ha praticamente cominciato a giocare con me, seduto di fianco a sganasciarsi e a trovare le soluzioni dei dungeon (sono molti) formulando teorie su teorie (I dungeon non sono particolarmente difficili, il bello viene quando trovi un nano bloccato nel ghiaccio e tu sei con una candela fredda nell'inventario).
Gli Easter Egg sono il dolce contorno del gioco ed'è sempre bello trovarli e capirli, oltre a trovarsi davanti personaggi che non servono a nulla se non a rendere il gioco estremamente divertente come un vecchietto maledetto che fa: "Sono stato programmato solo per intralciarti e darti fastidio" mettendosi davanti e impedendoti di attraversare la strada.
Insomma...giocatevelo se amate il genere e siete un po' nerd dentro.

Worthy of a thumbs up despite the in-game pandering for a review.


*Updated*
I felt as though the  review here deserved more as I can easily place this on a shorter list of RPG Maker games that have ended up impressing me over all. If you're looking for the polish and maturity that comes with a AAA studio, you won't find it here. If you're looking for light-hearted gamer humor in a JRPG package, this one is worth a look. Combat is what you would expect of a classic JRPG. Level design felt fairly well balanced, and grinding was not punishing imho. The art was again fun and lighthearted for those of us that have a nostalgia for the 80s. Granted I don't always ding an RPGM game for using stock graphics, so if that's a deal breaker you may find some disappointment in this respect as some of the graphics are stock. 

In short, if you see this on a special, it's well worth the investment!

[h1] Questa recensione è solamente per la VERSIONE SU STEAM. NON per la VERSIONE MOBILE [/h1]

[i] PRO [/i]
[list]
[*] Tante tante ore di divertimento
[*] Sistema di combattimento degno di un rpg
[*] Tante personalizzazioni dell'equipaggiamento
[*] Tante armi e magie
[*] Dialoghi divertenti
[*] Completamente italiano
[*] Storia semplice ma funziona
[*] Side quest molto belle e dungeon vari (Parlo quelle di Insano o dei nani)
[*] Boss con abilità diverse e difficili da sconfiggere se non si è a un livello adeguato
[/list]

[i] CONTRO [/i]
E qui i contro e mi dispiace veramente per la versione su steam che poteva andare molto meglio

[*] (Cominciamo col peggio): il porting su pc fa veramente pena, sembra che sia le texture si muovano da sole, mentre per la versione mobile questo non succede, e non penso che sia un problema della scheda video (vi lascio uno screen come prova http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=714113746 )
[*] Se si prova a mettere in fullscreen il gioco potrebbe crashare
[*] Le musiche (sopratutto quelle del menu principale) sono fastidiose e non belle da ascoltare
[*] Lo stesso vale per i suoni
[*] Nessun sync degli achievement (cosa meno importante per me)
[*] Costo veramente alto (10€ e 5€ scontato su steam ; 2€ e gratis per la versione Android mobile)
[*] I segreti sono veramente difficili da trovare, sopratutto a circa metà gioco (ne sono riuscito a trovare 3-4 in totale)
[*] Questi ti danno poche ricompense (denaro per la maggior parte)
[*] Side quest noiose (Parlo di quelle in cui devi uccidere nemici e ti da stelle) anche se le ricompense sono buone
[*] Quando esegui delle abilità o un attacco particolare ti spara un colore che ti devasta gli occhi
[/list]
In conclusione il voto finale è uno scarso 4/10 ; mentre per la versione mobile un bel 9/10 ci sta

Increible!!

Sinceramente, éste RPG me está sorprendiendo de forma bestial. Si te gusta el humor más absurdo posible, con cameos de clásicos, una historia original y un sistema de combate ques una mezcla entre los clásicos Final Fantasy y el Final Fantasy X, éste es tu juego.
Aparte he de añadir la dificultad que va adquiriendo el juego mientras avanzas, se hace dificil y muy muy interesante, ya que cada batalla puede ser decisiva.

No necesitas buscar un tiempo exclusivo para jugarlo, puedes echar ratos gracias a que puedes guardar en cualquier momento para que tu vida personal no sea un obstáculo para enviciarte cuando te apetezca. Y también para los que juegan horas sin parar, ya que siempre vas a querer ver que viene a continuación todo el rato.

Totalmente recomendado, una compra que me ha dejado con la boca abierta.

10/10

An enthusiast of traditional and modern J. R. P. G. games, I admit to be in love with this game.  Starved of that Final Fantasy I - IV feeling, this quenches my thirst. My only issue with the game, and I'm unsure if it was an installation error or something else, but the game frequently closes and sends me an error message. The game screen also flickers a lot when I play, and it does get a bit annoying, especially if I hadn't saved.

In Doom & Destiny spielen 4 Freunde D&D und geraten in eine bunte, witzige und überraschend große Welt und erleben ein großes Abenteuer, welches viele Paralellen und Anspielungen zu anderen Games hat wie Super Mario, Final Fantasy oder The Legend of Zelda.

Beim ersten Anlauf hab ich ne Menge rumgeidled und hab für die Story knapp 20 Stunden gebraucht, werde es aber vermutlich nochmal zocken.

This game is fantastic.  I love turn based RPGs, and at the price, this game takes the cake.

20385293.review:
Speziell für 80er und frühe 90er Jahrgänge stark zu empfehlen. Egal ob Zelda, Herr der Ringe, oder Super Mario - die zahllosen, rein zufällig implementierten Anspielungen auf eine breit gefächerte Gruppe von erfolgreichen Serien, Spielen oder Filmen; sorgt im Minutentakt für Schmunzler.

Ebenfalls dürfte das Game allen generellen jrpg-fans so einige Kindheitserinnerungen wieder wach rufen. Ob auch einige der alten "Standard-jrpg-Schönheitsfehler" (später weniger detailliert; sich von unterschiedlichen npc's wiederholende texte; u.Ä) gewollt sind, bleibt zu bezweifeln - groß gestört hat das aber auch nicht. 

Was noch erwähnt werden sollte: Die Hauptkampagne ist in 10 Stunden gut durchspielbar, was erstmal sehr kurz erscheint - ist es auch. Allerdings bietet das Game bei genauerer Beschäftigung wirklich zahllose secrets, sidequest und versteckte Belohnungen +dazugehöriger zufälliger Anspielungen.
Die halbe Map ist auf das Endgame ausgelegt (warum auch immer? eventuell zu wenig Bock gehabt die Hauptkampagne länger zu gestalten) -sprich: der Endboss der Kampagne ist BEI WEITEM nicht mal in den top10 der gefährlichsten Gegner!

20256307.review:
Gioco ironico e spiritoso, parodia dei vecchi giochi di ruolo che hanno accompagnato l'infanzia di molti giocatori.
Godibile anche da chi si avvicina a questo tipo di gioco per la prima volta.
I personaggi sono costruiti discretamente bene con caratteri e abilità ben definite che si associano perfettamente alla trama. Il sistema di combattimento è old-school, ma gestito molto bene, lasciando al giocatore un buon margine per vivere la propria partita con tattiche personalizzate.
Peccato per la gestione dell'equipaggiamento un po' macchinosa, poteva essere ottimizzata meglio. L'enorme numero di oggetti rende un po' complesso trovare l'equipaggiamento più adatto a una determinata situazione. Problema risolvibile vendendo i pezzi più vecchi, in modo da avere un inventario meno congestionato.
Questo difetto, tuttavia, non intacca più di tanto l'esperienza di gioco che resta godibile e leggera.
Vale decisamente i soldi spesi, in particolare per chi ha giocato ai titoli che hanno fatto la storia dei giochi di ruolo.
A volte è decisamente difficile smettere di ridere.
Inoltre, benchè sia un titolo decisamente parodistico, è innegabile che sia stato fatto con passione, impegno e amore.
A concludere, vorrei ricordare che è stato sviluppato da un team italiano, e trovare giochi così ben realizzati da programmatori del bel paese è tutt'altro che facile.
Da avere assolutamente nella propria libreria.

Die Kämpfe laufen rundenbasiert ab, die Karte ist nach alten Rollenspielklassikern von oben frei begehbar und ist mit vielen Geheimnissen und interessanten Orten entdeckt und ist größer als man denkt. Die Möglichkeit noch per Boot und Luftschiff zu reisen lässt einen nochmal neue Orte kennenzulernen. Die Charaktere sind witzig gestaltet  und lassen sich beliebig nach 4 Attributen aufleveln die mehr oder weniger zur Charakter klasse passen. Außerdem kann man sehr viele Fähigkeiten kaufen und ausrüsten mit oher Variation und Ausrüstung finden und kaufen wobei sich das Aussehen nur 2 mal im Spiel selbst ändert. Die Welt ist abwechslungsreich nach verschieden Landschaften gestaltet und mit vielen Eastereggs gespickt. Das Spiel nimmt andere Spielefranchises und Serien/Filme auf die Schippe und nimmt sich dabei selber nicht ernst. Man trifft auf Link, Muten-Roshi, Gandalf usw. Es gibt einige Nebenaufgaben und Aktivitäten. Der Soundtrack ist sehr gelungen. Die Grafik erinntert an alte Klassiker gleichzeitig ist sie aber auch nicht zu alt und hier und da sehr detailverliebt. Zusammenfassend kann man sagen Doom & Destiny ist ein lustiges und abstruses Rollenspiel mit rundenbasiertem Kampfsystem das sich selbst nicht ernst nimmt.

20210943.review:
Really well made game, it's a solid jrpg filled with humour.

You get to play with 4 characters that have fixed classes, but with the power system you can go for different builds. So the Warrior can decide to go "Paladin" by taking magical damage attacks (Smite Evil, Fire Sword,...), the Ninja can decide to go "Monk" by taking fist attacks (Stunning Fist, Fist of the South Star,...) and so on. This allows for a bit of replayability if someone wants to try different builds.

The story (which is very good IMHO) isn't really hard to finish, but after the end you get the choice to keep playing for some late game challenges. This last part is a bit grindy (you need a lot of gold to buy the ultimate equipment and powers) but it's still still enjoyable. And you get to fight the Flying Spaghetti Monster.

The authors of this game are italians, so italian players might get one joke or two more than the others (loved the Rat-Man reference :D )

Buy it.

20049351.review:
Dieses...
Spiel...
ist...
DER HAMMER!

Ich habe ewig nicht mehr so gelacht und gefeiert wie mit "Doom & Destiny".
Das gesamte Spiel ist wie ein Fandom für alle Videospiel und Rollenspiel Fans aus sämtlichen Kontinenten.
Und dabei kreiert es die meiner Meinung nach größte Parodie auf unsere Kindheit und Jugend ever!

Die Story:
Vier Nerds, ja ihr habt richtig gelesen, NERDS treffen sich zum regelmäßigen Pen & Paper Rollenspiel. Allerdings ist ihr Gamemaster nirgendwo aufzufinden und so machen sie sich auf den Weg ihn zu suchen. Aus heiterem Himmel finden sie sich in einer Fantasy Welt wieder, die von Imperator Destiny regiert wird und von einem dunklen Schatten bedroht wird.
Wie könnte es anders sein ist die "heilige Mission" nun das Königreich zu retten und "wahre Helden" zu werden, damit unsere Nerds endlich nach Hause können.

Das Gameplay:
Im Grunde ist es relativ einfach. Man steuert einen der Protagonisten, und die anderen drei folgen ihm im Gänsemarsch ;)
Man spricht random Leute an, kann bei Lehrmeistern neue Skillz für Golz freischalten und neue Ausrüstung in Shops zu kaufen. Dabei bewegt man sich zwischen den einzelnen Dörfern und Städten über die riesige Weltkarte, ähnlich wie bei vielen anderen RPGs aus der Vogelperspektive. Zwischendrin begegnet man, je nach Gegend zufälligen Gegnergruppen und "klatscht" den ein oder anderen Boss um. Mit jedem Level kann man Punkte verteilen und so die Eigenschaften der Nerds erhöhen und weitere SPs für Fähigkeiten freischalten.

Das Beste!:
Überall und an jeder Ecke wimmelt es vor Andeutungen und Parodien auf die Welt aus Film, Spiel und Manga/Anime.
Zum Beispiel gibt es einen Kapitelabschnitt der an Final Fantasy erinnert, ein anderer bedient sich Elementen von Dragon Ball und Pokemon. Dies sei genug um den potentiellen Käufern den Spaß nicht zu verderben ;) ...

Das Schlechte:
Nichts desto trotz rate ich Spielern mit niedriger Frust rate und wenig Geduld vom Kauf ab. Es ist zwar wirklich cool, aber man "muss" hin und wieder mit simplen Grinden und trainieren verbringen bzw. die ein oder andere Niederlage zähneknirschend akzeptieren und es noch einmal versuchen.

Das Fazit:
Und dennoch empfehle ich jedem heißblütigen Fan von JRPGs und anderen Rollenspielen sich Doom & Destiny zu geben. Es lohnt sich wirklich ;) ... und auch der Preis von 10 Mücken bzw. 4 oder 5 mit Reduzierung ist es alle mal Wert ;)

19109757.review:
Solid short RPG.

Positives
-The amount of end game content is about equal to the amount of content in the main storyline. 
-Interesting level design. The green ring upgrade course was something I hadn't seen done before.
-The party leader system and its stat changes were novel and a nice addition.
-The power/spell/ability system restricted what tools you could use and added an interesting layer of complexity.
-The creativity of some of the secret areas was enjoyable. The landscape textures being a subtle arrow pointing at a hidden door sticks in the mind.
-Status effects work on bosses and MP damage can solve a fight or two. Both are refreshing changes from the norm.

A negative
-Some parts can be frustrating to figure out. I had 3, 2 of which I resorted to the net to navigate through but 1 of those was me being forgetful.


Questionable

-The plot itself is enjoyable but a number of twists can be easily seen coming. So easliy in fact and due to the nature of the game's writing I can't decide if they were actually meant to be running jokes and not twists.

-There are characters scattered about (and marked) that ask you to post reviews on steam and comments of somesort on facebook. I don't know if you're rewarded for doing so as I had no intention of writing a review until I had actually beaten the game. This made these NPCs slightly annoying whenever they popped up but since they were marked out it wasn't terrible. Their addition probably encouraged me to write a review after I was done with it but their 3 options of "Link to Steam Review", "Link to Facebook", and "I am a stupid meanie head" was not endearing. A simple request/reminder without the aggression in the dialogue to end the conversation would have been enough.


It should be mentioned what when the game says "Alt + Enter for full screen" it's refering to left Alt. Similar to the encouter autofight button which is left Ctrl. I mention this incase you want to build a script to help you farm pirate keys late game. (stupid pirate keys)

The jokes may be funny at first, but they also rapidly become boring. The map design is pretty good (world map excluded), but I found the fights to be extremely repetitive. Combat variety is also very scarce. The soundtrack is ok, but the game itself uses a ton of premade RPG Maker graphics along with the beautiful custom resources, and that gives the game a "lazy" look on some parts. Part of it is by design, since this game wants(?) to be a parody of the JRPG genre, but I can't help but suspect that it was also to reduce the amount of work a lot and... well, it honestly feels very rough on the edges, despite its good qualities.

17617004.review:
Doom & Destiny is an RPGmaker game that makes fun of the tropes of its genre while adding tons of references to other games, movies, comics and animes into the mix: it sports some standard JRPG gameplay and story but its self-conscious sense of humour truly makes it an original and enjoyable experience.

[b]PROS:[/b]

-the standard plot is made very interesting by the humour that permeates it, the characters themselves know they're being used for stupid fetch quests but they play along nonetheless -often breaking the fourth wall- with hilarious results

-the whole parody of the rpg genre is very well done and makes fun of things such as same looking npcs, boring quests, being able to steal freely from npcs houses etc

-four party members with tons of loot and powers to choose from

-while the graphics are from RPGmaker they're very colourful and the devs really made sure all locations are filled with little details to make them appear more lively

-wide world map with many locations to find and explore

-good enemy variety

-tons of references from other games, movies, animes, books and more

-good length at least 10/12 hours for the main story+leveling for it plus more hidden bosses and areas available after clearing the last boss for those who wish to grind to be strong enough to tackle them

[b]CONS:[/b]

-there's no transition to the actual battle screen during random encounters, so they might feel thrown in your face until you get used to it

-a few grammatical errors or weird phrasings

-the gold level for side quests can get very grindy

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=501996574

I really enjoyed how self-conscious Doom & Destiny is in its humour, the game doesn't expect you to take it seriously and takes you for a fun ride on the various quirks one usually meets in rpgs. You're free to steal from homes because the king said so in an edict, npcs take their job of walking around aimlessly seriously, characters and npcs quote songs when using certain spells and, when questioned about it, some bosses might realize their plan of kidnapping the princess isn't as smart as it sounds: it's truly a ton of fun and I found myself chuclking at it quite often.

But make no mistake, behind its jokes and references the game is a solid rpg in itself with a good story, a nice power system that lets you tailor the four protagonists to your liking and a big world with lots of stuff to do. Doom & Destiny is absolutely recommended to fans of the genre.

17612724.review:
Really well made game, it's a solid jrpg filled with humour.

You get to play with 4 characters that have fixed classes, but with the power system you can go for different builds. So the Warrior can decide to go "Paladin" by taking magical damage attacks (Smite Evil, Fire Sword,...), the Ninja can decide to go "Monk" by taking fist attacks (Stunning Fist, Fist of the South Star,...) and so on. This allows for a bit of replayability if someone wants to try different builds.

The story (which is very good IMHO) isn't really hard to finish, but after the end you get the choice to keep playing for some late game challenges. This last part is a bit grindy (you need a lot of gold to buy the ultimate equipment and powers) but it's still still enjoyable. And you get to fight the Flying Spaghetti Monster.

The authors of this game are italians, so italian players might get one joke or two more than the others (loved the Rat-Man reference :D )

Buy it.

17163900.review:
Man, I really don't know where to begin with this review... But here we go.

Doom & Destiny is a turn based RPG that basically jokes about/steriotypes Tabletop RPGs as well as the "nerdy/geeky" lifestyle in a sense. It is very humorous, almost everything about this game will make you laugh if you understand it.
So here is a short list of pros and cons to this game.

Pros-

Graphics, this is a "if you like these kind of graphics" thing. Personally, the graphics are nice, bringing back memories of some of the classic pixelly RPGs of old.

Audio/Music, the music and audio are nice. Not really sure how else I should explain this... So there you go :-)

Combat, the combat is turn based, which I definitely like. Skills/Powers and there uses actually matter, the proper timing of a skill could really determine whether you end the battle in victory or in defeat. Strategy actually matters!

Skills/Powers, there are a lot of them! Plus, you get to choose basically any of them you want! In the game, you basically purchase your skills and give them to the characters, each character being able to equip a certain number of skills.

Character Development, you are basically able to shape the characters however you want. Although the characters have a class that they are given initially, the terms of what these will become is vary vague, and up to your personal interpretation. Want a Ranger? Make one. Want a Paladin? Make one. Want Kirito from SAO? Make him!

Alright, that is enough pros I think except from some more minor things, so lets continue with the cons.

Cons-

If you don't like "RPG Maker Games" or their like, then you probably won't like this one either. But let me just say, this is not your "cheap made RPG maker game", this is a milestone for games like this and it should not even be remotely compared to some of the other RPG maker titles currently on Steam.

Combat, but didn't I have combat in pros? Well, I like the combat, but it seems like others do not like it so much. Like some turn based games, the combat may feel slow at points or feel repetative. This leads to the next point...

Grinding, expect to grind some if you want to level your characters. Although for the most part you can just do quests and keep the action moving, you will need to do some actual leveling in order to proceed. Personally I have nothing wrong with experience hunting, but I understand that others do not like this so much usually, so I thought I would point this out.

Conclusion-

Doom & Destiny is definitely a game that is worth the money, if not for the gameplay (which itself is amazing), then for the comical aspect of it. It is definitely a unique game like nothing else I have seen previous. You should definitely get this if you want to play a fun, casual game with lots of humor.

May your adventures be many and always end in reward!
-Donoknight, Founder of the Tabletop RPG Gamers League

15440183.review:
Having been a roleplayer a large portion of my life. I always wondered what it would be like to actually live out one of the many adventures I had played late night with my friends. Doom & Destiny approaches this in true form. Bad jokes, immaturity and plenty of junk food. Except instead of high amounts of calories, you get HP and MP. From the moment the game starts it delves into the meta and lampooning everything you loved about RPGs. Now you can expect the standard helping of RPGMaker Pixel graphics, turn based combat, hundreds of items/spells and huge overworld to explore. What makes Doom & Destiny rise above the rest, is its dialogue and characters. Why are they on this crazy adventure? Who cares. Just have fun is the mentality, and It shows. With 20 hours of core story and plenty of side quests. Doom & Destiny is wonderful homage to late night roleplaying sessions with friends, having an adventure of a lifetime!

I made a video review to show off some of the features and gameplay of this game!
https://youtu.be/xAxUq5dlvlA
I hope you enjoy!

15273525.review:
I've been looking for an old-fashioned RPG ever since playing some old favorites from the Final Fantasy and Dragon Quest series recently. I tried a few JRPG's on Steam that just weren't doing it for me and came across Doom & Destiny while browsing the RPG section and decided to buy it on a whim. It was one of my best impulse buys in a while. 

D&D was exactly what I was looking for in an old-school exploration/grinding RPG and on top of giving me the experience I wanted, it also made me laugh along the way. Now, the humor relies heavily on the assumption that the player has a lot of experience with the RPG genre, but I assume if you're interested in this type of game, then chances are you are quite familiar with the games that it lampoons. 

Aside from being funny, the gameplay is pretty solid. There's a certain amount of customization that goes into leveling your characters and deciding which powers you want them to equip. The combat can seem a little repetitive, but if you're not a fan of grinding, then you probably shouldn't be playing this type of RPG to begin with. Add in the fact that there's literally hundreds of weapons and items to use, and you have quite a lot of game packed into this little indie. I just finished the main quest which took about 20 hours, but for the hardcore players out there, there's at least 20 more hours of gameplay that you can do after the main story line.

I can't wait to see what these guys develop next and hope that a D&D sequel will arrive someday.

15201930.review:
Hry vytvořené v RPG Makeru jsou často pokládány za méněcenné. Přiznám se, že sám jsem je považoval spíše za takové hříčky. Můj názor se razantně změnil až u hry To the Moon. Nádherné romantické drama si dokázalo najít cestu až k mému srdci a tato hra mě naprosto pohltila, až mi málem i na konci ukápla slza. Doom and Destiny (dále jen DD) je totálně jiné, ale kvalitou předčí nejeden AAA titul. Pojďme si říct, proč je tomu tak.

[h1]Humor[/h1]
Ano, v každé druhé hře najdete nějaký ten vtip nebo easter egg a považujete to za příjemný bonus. DD je však prošpikováno neustálými narážkami, odkazy na různé hry/filmy/seriály/knihy/události. Čím více jste nerd/geek, tím více zábavy dostanete. Máte tu jako průvodce Jidáše, máte najít 4 prsteny, jeden z bossů připomíná jednu tlustou bílou postavu z Krotitelů duchů, další z bossů je na obědě, čeká vás debata o vztahu orka a princezny, potkáte královnu elfů, která tvrdí, že ví vše a přitom se vás neustále na vše vyptává a tak podobně. Humor tu číhá na každém rohu a je skutečně nápaditý a občas uhodí nečekaně a tím vás shodí ze židle.

Jako u jedné z mála her jsem tu skutečně chodil za KAŽDOU postavou a promluvil si s ní a v 98% jsem byl odměněn vtipnou hláškou, narážkou na něco (např. že vlci v lese se chovají divně, protože u sebe nosí zlato... :D), tipem (že nejlepší způsob, jak vyhrát boj, je nezemřít) atd. Potom mě dostalo těch pár postav, které mě pobízely, ať napíši recenzi na tuto hru. Takže sečteno a podtrženo - humoru je tu spousta a je opravdu neskutečně vtipný.

[h1]Hratelnost[/h1]
Samotný humor ale nestačí. Jelikož je tato hra RPG v japonském stylu, jde tu i o souboje a levelování. Na začátku hry si postavy samy od sebe vyberou třídy - válečník, mág, ninja a pirát... Bojem získáte body zkušeností, ty investujete do 4 kategorií (životy/síla, rychlost/vyhýbání, šance na kritický útok/větší přísun zkušeností/odolnost, mana/sloty na speciální útoky). Nutno říct, že každá postava má svou vlastní barvu oblečení (např. válečník je červený) a každá vlastnost má také svou barvu (např. životy/síla jsou červené), takže je jasné, že takhle se musí jednotlivé postavy vylepšovat. Teď se někteří zhrozili, že ono je to vlastně jednoduché. Ne, není. A to díky soubojům.

[h1]Průběh soubojů[/h1]
Každá postava má na výběr 4 možnosti:
[olist]
    [*]útok (je jen jeden a závisí na zbrani, kterou daná postava má)
    [*]speciální útok (můžete jich mít více a dokupujete si je, přičemž v jednu chvíli můžete mít u sebe jen určitý počet; tento speciální útok snižuje manu)
    [*]vyčkat (neboli se posunout o pár polí dozadu)
    [*]použít nějaký předmět z inventáře (léčivé předměty, doplnění many, zrušení účinků kouzla, oživení...)
[/olist]

Jak jste už asi pochopili, na začátku boje se nahoře objeví časová linie, kdy je kdo na tahu. Postavy jsou řazeny dle rychlosti, takže třeba ninja zaútočí i 3x po sobě, zatímco válečník jen jednou.
Základní útok se odvíjí od vaší zbraně. Speciální dle zvoleného útoku (může to být vyléčení všech vašich hrdinů, oživení některého z nich, jeho posílení nebo útok na jednotlivce či celou skupinu nepřátel).

Ale pozor! Musíte přemýšlet. Oheň neublíží drakovi a v extrémních případech si situaci ještě zhoršíte. Bojoval jsem v podzemí s bossem, který byl obrovská baterie a já blbec na něj použil blesky. Ano, někteří z vás již tuší, že jsem mu doplnil dost životů...

Souboje jsou prostě lahůdka a někteří nepřátelé jsou vážně vtipní a nečekaní. Bohužel zde přichází jediná vada na kráse tohohle klenotu. Časem je těchto soubojů prostě moc. Při průchodu krajinou chodíte po políčkách a zhruba na každém desátém narazíte na nepřítele. To znamená boj tak na 3 minuty, což je špatné, když musíte jít tam a pak se stejnou cestou zase vracet. Naštěstí se jde pokusit utéct z boje, ale když to nevyjde, ztratíte dost životů.

[h1]Grafika a hudba[/h1]
Ano, tyhle dva prvky jsou doplňkové, protože díky původu hry u nich nelze čekat zázraky. I přes to hudba perfektně doplňuje atmosféru hry a grafika nevypadá zas tak zle. Díky časté změně lokací a různorodým prostředím se navíc máte i čím kochat.

[h1]Herní náplň[/h1]
Po dokončení hry a i kdykoliv během hraní příběhu se můžete vydat kamkoliv na mapu a procházet dungeony, hledat tajné místnosti nebo jen tak zabíjet pro radost. Také jsou tu poschovávání ultra bossové, kteří vám pořádně zatopí, můžete tu hledat ztracené trpaslíky, bojovat v arénách, hledat vylepšení na prsteny atd. Možností je opravdu spousta a tahle hra vám tak může vydržet i na víc jak 50 hodin. Navíc je tu i pár logických hádanek, takže to není jen čistokrevná mlátička, ale musíte zapojit i mozek.

[h1]Plusy[/h1]
+ naprosto famózní humor
+ desítky narážek a easter eggů
+ jednoduchost a zároveň komplexnost hry
+ systém soubojů
+ obrovská mapa
+ zajímaví a vtipní nepřátelé
+ zajímavý příběh a občas i originální úkoly
+ po dohrání hry lze stále dělat spoustu věcí
+ atmosféra, která vás vcucne už po pár minutách hraní
+ hudba
+ grafická stylizace a různorodá prostředí (les, poušť, laboratoř, město, vesnice, hory...)
+ délka hry (kolem 12 hodin, pokud děláte jen hlavní úkoly)
+ nízká cena
+ tvůrci hry pomáhají s řešením problémů a jsou aktivní na fóru hry na Steamu

[h1]Mínusy[/h1]
- místy až příliš moc soubojů
- větší mapy jsou dost často nepřehledné (není tu nic jako minimapa v dungeonech a městech, takže se musíte orientovat dle své paměti)
- není čeština

[h1]Konečný verdikt[/h1]
[b]Mé hodnocení: 9,2/10[/b]

Pokud jste milovníky RPG, tahle hra je pro vás. Pokud máte rádi humor, tahle hra je pro vás. Pokud máte rádi popkulturní narážky a easter eggy, tahle hra je pro vás. A pokud nedej bože máte rádi všechny tři výše vyjmenované věci... Kupte si tuhle pecku a poděkovat mi můžete později. 15029087.review:
Okay, so. Doom & Destiny.

It looked like a lot of fun when I first opened it up, something along the lines of Knights of Pen and Paper. I was partially correct, in that the plot involves a D&D group (Doom and Destiny, Dungeons and Dragons, whatever, as long as they don't get sued) that ends up journeying through their own "real lives" while encountering many elements one might find in a tabletop RPG, all the while cracking fourth wall jokes and throwing in pop culture references.

If this plot was a personality, Knights of Pen and Paper would be the dry-humored friend who likes repetetive tasks but also wants their friends to be happy, while Doom & Destiny is that friend that nobody actually invites to anything but shows up anyway with news that was old six months ago and meme jokes that haven't ever actually been funny.

The combat is a pain, specifically the random encounters throughout the dungeons (not that I played past the first boss, I got bored before I even unlocked the first Door That Needs a Weird Key). You're walking along a passageway, and all of a sudden your down arrow is scrolling at breakneck speed down the combat menu. There's no animation, no alert for "hey, you're gonna fight some enemies now", just a nasty surprise when you just wanted to take four steps without having to jolt yourself out of the moment of fun you might have been having to hold the Left Ctrl key and power blast through the combat without making a single tactical decision.

Overall, poorly written, poorly designed, and above all, just not enjoyable to play.

15018280.review:
Вам нравится Final fantasy? Если да, то вам определенно стоит обратить свое внимание на эту игру!
Блуждая как-то по одному сайту в далеком 2011 в поиске подобных RPG, мой взгляд ненадолго задержался на этой. С виду вроде бы стандартная игра на RPG-maker, которые успели уже почти наскучить к тому времени. Решил скачать...

[b]ИСТОРИЯ:[/b]
4 друга пришли в гости к Бенджамину (сам создатель игры) чтобы отлично провести вечер. Но не тут-то было... Их переносит в огромный удивительный мир с драконами, магией, орками и схватками с холодным оружием. Все как полагается. Попутно пытаясь вернуться домой, выполняя разнообразные квесты, друзья ищут самого Бенджамина... Сюжет в игре довольно стандартный. Почти... 

[b]БОЕВАЯ СИСТЕМА И РАЗВИТИЕ:[/b]
Боевка в игре мало отличается от подобных игр такого типа. Пошаговые ходы, разве что вверху прикручена "лента времени", на которой отображено кто ходит следующий и таким образом можно рассчитать тактику, например уничтожив того врага, а не этого. Есть магия, есть навыки, в русской локализации (о ней подробнее позже) именуемые мощами. А теперь подробнее: у каждого персонажа есть 4 характеристики и при получении нового уровня персонаж получает три очка, которые может распределить между этими характеристиками. И при достижении определенной планки в каждой из характеристик (планка выделяется) персонаж получает +1 очко мощей. Навыков в игре очень много, более 100, для каждого персонажа свои, все их экипировать невозможно, так как "очков мощей" немного. Поэтому следует разумно выбирать умения для каждого персонажа. Довольно уникальная система, не помню, чтобы я где-то такое встречал. 

[b]ПОБОЧНЫЕ КВЕСТЫ:[/b]
В игре также присутствуют побочные квесты. Например, уничтожить определенное кол-во волков, драконов, неживых и т.д. После битвы можно увидеть изменения в виде заполняющихся пяти звезд, бронзовых, серебряных или золотых. Сперва заполняются бронзовые пять, за это получается награда, после этого - серебряные и более качественная награда и, наконец, золотые с отличным предметом за выполнение.
Напишу несколько слов и об аренах. В игре есть некоторое кол-во арен, на которых можно испытать свои силы и заработать аренные жетоны, меняемые на уникальные предметы в магазинчике рядом. 

[b]ИССЛЕДОВАНИЕ:[/b]
Если вам нравится Final Fantasy, вам определенно понравится эта замечательная RPG. Очень большое разнообразие побочных квестов, разнообразие игры, дополнительные испытания для улучшения волшебных колец, каждое из которых уникальное и запоминающееся. Несмотря на огромное количество запертых домов по всей игре, здесь есть что исследовать, можно посетить каждый уголок и при этом будет чувство, что вы чего-то не закончили и не получили, так как в инвентаре наверняка останутся еще предметы, которые вы где-то не использовали. Я серьезно - эта игра даже в чем-то превосходит оригинальные части Final Fantasy.
P.S. Сохраняться можно в любом месте.

[b]ДИАЛОГИ И ЮМОР:[/b]
Этот пункт несомненно нужно выносить отдельно. Игра с самого начала цепляет солидным количеством юмора, иронии и сарказма, чего наверное и не хватает другим играм этого жанра. Здесь такое изобилие приколов, включая иронию на игры такого жанра ("Они прыгают, значит тренируются, вы ничего не понимаете!"), забавные надписи на могилах, как в Sacred и иногда очень неожиданных врагов [spoiler](два огромных фаллоимитатора, бык, который умеет увеличиваться в размерах сам или частами, от чего сбежали женщины, и т.д.)[/spoiler], что игроку заскучать будет явно некогда. Пожалуй приколов тут даже больше половины. Смешиваясь с основным сюжетом это становится неотъемлемой частью игры и своей фишкой. На моей памяти это первая подобная RPG, где есть хороший юмор, который прям идеально сочетается с игрой. Местами есть даже самоирония. Да и русская локализация оказалась хорошей, несмотря на большое количество ошибок.

[b]ПЛЮСЫ:[/b]
1. Юмор, самоирония
2. Огромное пространство для исследования, масса секретов.
3. Нештампованная боевая система. 

[b]МИНУСЫ:[/b]
... Думая около минуты над тем, что можно написать в минусы, я ни к чему не пришел. Их нет. Ну разве что масса ошибок в русской локализации на текущий момент, но со временем, быть может, это исправится.

Подытожим: игра точно перевернет ваше представление о жанре и возможно даже понравится больше самой Final Fantasy!
Твердая 10/10!

Sur une trame RPG des plus classiques, D&D propose un véritable retour aux sources mélant humour, hommage et clins d'oeil.

Une équipe de 4 personnages avec chacun sa spécialité (ninja, guerrier, mage et pirate), son équipement, ses techniques et sa personnalité se lance dans une aventure fantastique un peu malgré elle. Et vous ne serez pas déçus..

Doom & Destiny - это потрясающая RPG от Итальянских разработчиков, изначально задуманная, как шутка над друзьями, но потом переросшая в отдельный проект. 

Приятная графика, интуитивность управления и всем знакомая система боев, а также сотни диалогов не дадут заскучать. 
Помимо основного сюжета имеются и кучи дополнительных и побочных заданий, сотни уникальных локаций, да и это еще не все. В Steam-версии добавлены достижения, карточки, смайлики и бэкграунды для клиента, которые захочет получить каждый :)

В дополнение каждый найдет в игре море отсылок к известным проектам, таким как Mario, The Legend Of Zelda, а также увидит немало скрытых отсылок к фильмам и комиксам, например Охотники за Приведениями или Власелин Колец. Так же, для "детей 90х" в игре спрятан не один тайник, отмеченный Секретным Местом (за нахождение которых Герои награждаются достижением). 

В игре три уровня сложности, что наверняка подстегнет вас пройти игру минимум раз, а то и не один! Соберите все достижения, найдите все секретные места, прокачайте героев и исследуйте удивительную вселенную мира Doom & Destiny!

14948722.review:
I finished the game on the Android version, I just started playing it on the PC, and I already regret it,

because it will suck me in again and make me lose preciuos life time.

The game plays like a traditional RPG with some smart twists, and the main selling point is the story, compelling and full of good humor and countless jokes on pop culture tropes. Maybe, just maybe it gets a litte worse in the very last part, but as a whole it is great. 

The characters are all funny and interesting, except Nigel: everybody hates Nigel. 

As a quick note on Gameplay: I usually don't like JRPG " à la" Final Fantasy. I hate mindless turn combat and really, really  hate random encounters and grinding, but this game was a nice change of pace: the initiative management and the aggro system make everything more interesting, and the "speed-up" button is a blessing to quickly resolve easy random encounter when you backtrack to older part of the map.

Recommended!

14948601.review:
ENGLISH REVIEW: 

Dnd is a game about four friends mistakenly summoned in a world of magic and believed
to be heroes. In reality they're a bunch of nerds trying to return to their homes while they
enjoy a wonderful adventure in a fantasy land filled with treasures, castles, dragons, orcs,
elves and... Santa Claus.

The first thing I thought about Doom and Destiny was "here's another rpg maker game that
is trying to be a parody of other famous rpgs like final fantasy"... And I was right, the
game is just this, but done well... very well. 

The humor is very captivating and the jokes will make you laugh in more than one occasion. And don't think the story doesn't take itself seriously at all, because it does, delivering a fascinating story without "plot holes" even though it's a parody.

I dare to say Doom and Destiny is a perfect blend of storytelling and great humor, with a gameplay on par with titles from the final fantasy series and the possibility of exploring the world, which is something that similar games don't do anymore. And secrets, lots of secrets scattered through the map and in the numerous locations of the game.

Also the game has 3 difficulty settings so it can be played by everyone.

Both the music and the graphics are licensed contents, they weren't made by the developers but bought from third parties and put into the game. I don't consider this a real flaw, but I know some people stay away from games with rpg maker graphics because they think they're not worth it... Well, if you can get over the fact that the graphics is standard rpg maker, I assure you'll find a real gem.

If you played "the Bridge", a very good puzzle game here on Steam, you'll notice that the game opening music is the same of Doom and Destiny, but does this make The Bridge a bad game only because they share the same opening song? no, so don't be discouraged by these things someone could call "flaws" and give this game a chance. You'll not regret it.


RECENSIONE ITA:

Dnd è un gioco che racconta di quattro amici evocati per sbaglio in una terra magica e scambiati per eroi. In realtà sono quattro nerdacci della peggior specie che cercano un modo per tornare a casa, ma non prima di essersi gustati una fantastica avventura in un mondo pieno di tesori, castelli, draghi, orchi, elfi e... Babbo Natale.

La prima cosa che ho pensato di Dnd è stata "ecco un altro gioco fatto con Rpg Maker che cerca di fare la parodia di altri famosi rpg come Final Fantasy"... e avevo ragione, il gioco è essenzialmente questo, ma fatto bene... davvero bene.

L'humor è accattivante e le battute ti faranno ridere in più di un'occasione. E non pensiate che la storia non si prende sul serio nemmeno un po', perché lo fa, regalando una trama affascinante senza "plot holes", e questo è già tanto essendo una parodia.

Mi permetto di affermare che Dnd è una perfetta miscela di storia e umorismo, con un gameplay al pari di titoli della serie Final Fantasy e la possibilità di esplorare il mondo di gioco, qualcosa che non si vede più tanto spesso in questo tipo di giochi... e segreti, tantissimi segreti sparsi per la mappa e nelle numerose aree del gioco. Inoltre il gioco ha 3 livelli di difficoltà, così da poter essere giocato da tutti.

Sia la musica che la grafica sono contenuti acquistati da terze parti e concesse dietro licenza. Personalmente non considero questo un vero difetto, ma so che molta gente si tiene alla larga dai giochi con grafica Rpg maker perchè pensa manchino di originalità... ebbene, se riuscirete a guardare oltre le grafiche di rpg maker vi assicuro che vi ritroverete di fronte ad una vera perla del genere ricolmo di originalità ed estro creativo.

Se avete giocato "The Bridge", un buon puzzle game qui su Steam, noterete che la musica di apertura è la stessa di Dnd, perché acquistata dallo stesso musicista; ma questo rende forse "The Bridge" un brutto gioco? non credo, quindi non fatevi scoraggiare da queste limitazioni del titolo e date una chance ad un grande gioco; non ve ne pentirete.
